{{ddcl|since=c++11|
locale_type getloc() const;
}}

Returns the current locale associated with the regular expression.

Effectively calls {{c|traits_i.getloc()}} where {{tt|traits_i}} is a default initialized instance of the type {{tt|Traits}}, stored within the regular expression object.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current locale associated with the regular expression.
